tools.description: Effortlessly visualize JSON structures as interactive and dynamic tree diagrams.

tools.name: Leadership Power Tools: SQL and Statistics
tools.description: Covering SQL & DuckDB, then some useful statistical tools: summary stats, distributions, confidence intervals and Bayesian reasoning.

tools.name: Collection of insane and fun facts about SQLite
tools.description: And many more. Some of them are truly insane, such as the fact it is maintained by 3 people who don't allow any external contribution.

tools.name: Using GPS in the year 1565
tools.description: There’s a wonderful web app (“Allmaps Here”) that shows your GPS location on old maps.

tools.name: MapMatrix
tools.description: A simple website allowing users to create synchronised grids of maps.

tools.name: Building Game Prototypes with LÖVE
tools.description: Building game prototypes with LÖVE— a framework for making 2D games in Lua.

tools.name: Visualizing all my steps
tools.description: Writing a bit about a visualization that’s not a map. It’s the beginning of the new year (happy new year, everyone!) and I’ve been playing with data from my Fitbit tracker.

tools.name: Describing Distributions
tools.description: In various data analyses, we often need to visualize distributions of various quantative varibles.

tools.name: What is geocoding?
tools.description: Geocoding is translating between geo coordinates (latitude, longitude) and human place descriptions (addresses, placenames, etc).
